item.title: Common Weaknesses Cybercriminals Exploit
item.description: While reading the Cisco Annual Report they came up with seven common social engineering attacks that cybercriminals use. Now these types of attacks are common and are not unheard of. You should be familiar with most if not all these weaknesses that cybercriminals use. Sex appeal, which means scammers will try to find or put up attractive man or woman. Then tempt the user for information. People should rememberÂ if you don't know the person this will more than likely not be romance but something else.
